column1: Art Institute of Chicago////As we'd dedicated the day to this museum
column2: we explored a lot more of what they had to offer.   (I) had no idea just how large this museum was... I had assumed it would be about the size of the Musee D'Orsay in Paris.  Wow
column3: was I wrong!  One full day was not nearly adequate.  Despite having wonderfully gracious staff helping us to navigate around the areas closed for remodeling
column4: we found ourselves feeling more and more pressed for time... even with a very efficient visit to the Court Cafe... By the end of the day
column5: we were dragging... and had seen little more than the highlights of this wonderful institution.  This demands a return trip!
